paragraphs: Goods bound for Turo's Fortress. Make no stops and keep a clear accounting of all damaged or lost cargo. Turo has no patience for incompetence.

Ten bolts, fine silk
Twenty-six bottles, Alto Wine
Fifteen jars, fine ceramics
Eight sacks, Anequine spices
Thirty sacks, Colovian grain
Six crates—
<The rest of the document has been torn, likely by a curious terror bird.>
